statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE pricing_agreement_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, email_address, product_catalog_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE pricing_agreement_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE product_catalog_id = 5 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%5555%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, unit_price FROM suppliers s JOIN pricing_agreements p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 100;
SELECT agreement_id, unit_price FROM pricing_agreements WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT agreement_id, start_date, end_date, agreement_details FROM PricingAgreements WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT p.product_name, pc.price, s.supplier_name FROM ProductCatalog pc JOIN Suppliers s ON pc.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN PricingAgreements pa ON s.supplier_id = pa.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON pc.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS agreement_count FROM Suppliers s JOIN PricingAgreements pa ON s.supplier_id = pa.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY agreement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductCatalog pc LEFT JOIN Orders o ON pc.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, order_date, total_amount, product_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, start_date, agreement_details FROM suppliers JOIN pricing_agreements ON suppliers.supplier_id = pricing_agreements.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING product_count > 2
SELECT supplier_name, agreement_details FROM suppliers s JOIN pricing_agreements pa ON s.supplier_id = pa.supplier_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
